posts.post_content: My trick with this card is to have a creature that can block all creatures or [Lure](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Lure ) them. Then have that have it equipped with Wooden Stake. posts.post_content: truly powerful vampire that requires immediate removal before she can get online. as people have said, pinger, new age memnarch, etc, but lets not forget a big one. she can ping any creature to pump herself. that includes those big beasties that you just took from your opponent. swing and then pump her by draining non attacking creatures for maximum damage. gets her out of tricky spots. this girl came to play rough, and is very playable, even if you dont take control of their creatures.

Posted By: Dustsomeday (4/11/2012 6:37:47 PM)
Rating:

posts.post_content:
Part of me wishes she has some sort of "history" with Sorin. Wink wink, nudge nudge.  
  
Now as for the card itself... I put her in my Vampire tribal deck because I needed a creature costing 4 that had good presence to back up my mostly-weenie creature base. I thought she would work well based on her abilities in adding to your own army, but was a little worried that the costs of them would be a little prohibitive. In practice, though, I found them fairly usable instead. Having them split in two makes her quite versatile, and you can do quite a lot to make her useful.
posts.html:
Part of me wishes she has some sort of "history" with Sorin. Wink wink, nudge nudge.

Now as for the card itself... I put her in my Vampire tribal deck because I needed a creature costing 4 that had good presence to back up my mostly-weenie creature base. I thought she would work well based on her abilities in adding to your own army, but was a little worried that the costs of them would be a little prohibitive. In practice, though, I found them fairly usable instead. Having them split in two makes her quite versatile, and you can do quite a lot to make her useful.

posts.post_content:
The first ability should be "1R:Olivia Voldaren deals 1 damage to **a NON-VAMPIRE** creature. That creature becomes a Vampire in addition to its other types. Put a +1/+1 counter on Olivia Voldaren."   
The user of Olivia should have to decide to either make a creature vampire and never ping it again; or kill it now.  
It just makes sense. Both flavor wise and power level wise.
